title: 9 Epic Holi Moments From Bollywood That We’d Love To Recreate
text:
facebook 
B-town and the festival of holi have had a long-standing relationship. Right from the iconic holi song sequence in Sholay , to the steamy scene in Goliyon Ki Rasleela Ram-Leela , there have been some classic moments that we've all loved. As we get ready to go colour crazy again, here are some iconic B-town moments that you could put on that wishlist, and recreate this year. After all " Dil toh Bollywood crazy hai ji " 1. That super fun moment in Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani where Deepika Padukone steps out, get's her hand on a hose, and just goes crazy. 2. And that dance sequence, later, with Ranbir Kapoor was just the best. 3. Meeting a hottie like Ranveer Singh during your holi celebrations. 4. Going all desi , aka Akshay Kumar and Priyanka Chopra in Waqt, and grooving to a (slightly mindless) number like Do me a favour let's play holi ... 5. Get totally high on bhaang , and groove on Rang Barse7. Stuck in the hostel this holiday? Take cue from Arjun Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, and get the entire batch to shake a leg. 8. Yes, holi means getting down and dirty. But that in no way means you can't look like a diva. 9. Get the family to come together, just like Amitabh Bachchan and Hema Malini in Baghban Gifs via Tumblr / Giphy / Photo via BCCL
